# Timace.co website homepage (2026-01-01 15:54Z)

_**User (2026-01-01 15:58Z)**_

I'm building a website for a company.

It is a student project. Very similar to https://tuuli.cz/

We currently do not have any images and we will build it from scratch once we have it.

I'm looking to create a nice looking website for it.

We're students from tiimiakatemia.

We have an instagram: https://www.instagram.com/timace.co 

It is a company which has multiple projects.

So I want just a homepage

---

_**Agent (model claude-4.5-opus-high-thinking, mode Plan)**_

The user wants to build a homepage for their student company "Timace" from Tiimiakatemia. They mentioned:

1. It's a student project similar to https://tuuli.cz/
2. They're from Tiimiakatemia (a Finnish entrepreneurship academy)
3. They have an Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/timace.co
4. It's a company with multiple projects
5. They currently don't have images
6. They want just a homepage

1. What kind of aesthetic/style they want
2. What content should be on the homepage
3. What projects/sections they want to highlight

Let me read the current files to understand the existing setup.</details></think>

- A full-screen hero with a team photo background

- Dark footer with legal info
